parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the file resource. Supports fuzzy search.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account used by the workspace administrator. You can log on to the Alibaba Cloud Management Console and view the ID on the Security Settings page.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the data to retrieve, used for pagination.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The page number of the data to retrieve, used for pagination.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description:
The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.

You must configure this parameter to specify the DataWorks workspace to which the API operation is applied.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The resource type. This parameter specifies a filter condition.

Valid values:

*   Python
*   Jar
*   Archive
*   File
